Sentencas: Mitigating fuel starvation and improving load-following capability of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) are conflicting control objectives.
Titulo: Robust Control of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ultracapacitor Hybrid System

Sentencas: In this paper, we address this issue using a hybrid SOFC ultracapacitor configuration.
Titulo: Robust Control of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ultracapacitor Hybrid System

Sentencas: Fuel starvation is prevented by regulating the fuel cell current using a steady-state invariant relationship involving fuel utilization, fuel flow, and current.
Titulo: Robust Control of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ultracapacitor Hybrid System

Sentencas: Two comprehensive control strategies are developed.
Titulo: Robust Control of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ultracapacitor Hybrid System

Sentencas: The first is a Lyapunov-based nonlinear control and the second is a standard H infinity robust control.
Titulo: Robust Control of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ultracapacitor Hybrid System

Sentencas: Both strategies additionally control the state of charge of the ultracapacitor that provides transient power compensation.
Titulo: Robust Control of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ultracapacitor Hybrid System

Sentencas: A hardware-in-the-loop test stand is developed where the proposed control strategies are verified.
Titulo: Robust Control of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ultracapacitor Hybrid System
